Detailed Description

Defines an ACIA (Asynchronous Communication Interface Adapter) device driver.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DriverACIA::DriverACIA (   ) 
 

Constructor. Driver initialization.

Constructor. Initialize the ACIA driver. In the ACIA Interrupt mode, initialize the reception index and semaphores and allow reception and emission interrupts. In the ACIA Busy Waiting mode, simply inittialize the ACIA working mode and create the semaphore.

Member Function Documentation

void DriverACIA::InterruptReceive (   ) 
 

Reception interrupt handler. Used in the ACIA Interrupt mode only.

Reception interrupt handler. Used in the ACIA Interrupt mode only. Reveices a character through the ACIA. Releases the receptionFinished semaphore and disables reception interrupts when the last character of the message is received (character '').

void DriverACIA::InterruptSend (   ) 
 

Emission interrupt handler. Used in the ACIA Interrupt mode only.

Emission interrupt handler. Used in the ACIA Interrupt mode only. Detects when it's the end of the message (if so, releases the emissionFinished semaphore), else sends the next character according to index indSend.

int DriverACIA::TtyReceive (  char *  buff,
int  lg
) 
 

Receive a message using the ACIA.

Routine to reveive a message through the ACIA (Busy Waiting and Interrupt mode).

int DriverACIA::TtySend (  char *  buff  ) 
 

Send a message through the ACIA.

Routine to send a message through the ACIA (Busy Waiting or Interrupt mode)
